sen.j: スルッとKANSAI（するっとかんさい）とは、関西（近畿地方）の公共交通機関の乗車カードのネットワーク、または大阪府大阪市に本社を置くその協議会の筆頭会社である。
sen.e: Surutto KANSAI is a name of railway card for public transport system in Kansai (Kinki area), or the biggest company of its association who has a head office in Osaka city, Osaka-Prefecture.

Surutto KANSAI is the name of a railway card for the public transport system in Kansai (Kinki area), or the biggest company of its association, which has a head office in Osaka City, Osaka-Prefecture.

Surutto KANSAI is the network of the railway cards for the public transport system in Kansai (Kinki area), or the biggest company in its association, which has a head office in Osaka City, Osaka-Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 乗車カードのネットワーク、としました。

sen.j: 筆頭会社の正式な商号は株式会社スルッとKANSAIである。
sen.e: The official business name of this company is Surutto KANSAI Co Ltd.
The official business name of this company is Surutto KANSAI Co. Ltd.
The company's official business name is Surutto KANSAI Co., Ltd.
sen.cmt: Co., としました（カンマ追加）。

sen.j: スルッとKANSAIはシステムの名称であり、カードの名称は発行社局により異なる。
sen.e: Surutto KANSAI is the name of the system, the name of the card varies depending on which company issuing them.
Surutto KANSAI is the name of the system, but the name of the card varies depending on which company issues it.
Surutto KANSAI is the name of the system, but the name of the card varies depending on which company issues it.

sen.j: 1992年4月1日、阪急電鉄がそれまで乗車券購入や運賃精算用として販売していたラガールカードを用いたストアードフェアシステム「ラガールスルー」の運用を開始し、1994年には能勢電鉄が自社のパストラルカードとラガールカードを共通化する形で参加。
sen.e: On April 1st, 1992 Hankyu Railway Co., Ltd introduced the usage of stored fare system, 'Lagare through', using Lagare Card which was previously used to purchase a ticket or to adjust the train fare, Nose Electric Railway also introduced their Pastoral Card together with Lagare Card in 1994.

On April 1, 1992 the Hankyu Railway Co., Ltd. introduced the usage of a stored fare system, 'Lagare Through,' using the Lagare Card, which was previously used to purchase a ticket or to adjust the train fare; the Nose Electric Railway also introduced its Pastoral Card together with Lagare Card in 1994.

On April 1, 1992 the Hankyu Railway Co., Ltd. introduced the usage of a stored fare system, 'Lagare Through,' using the Lagare Card, which was previously used to purchase a ticket or to adjust the train fare; the Nose Electric Railway Co., Ltd. also introduced its Pastoral Card together with the Lagare Card in 1994.
sen.cmt: Nose Electric Railway Co., Ltd.としました。

sen.j: そしてこれを当時自動改札機の更新を予定していた阪神電気鉄道、大阪市交通局、北大阪急行電鉄の3社局にも拡張対応させ、1996年3月20日から「スルッとKANSAI」の統一名称を用いての運用を開始した。
sen.e: As Hanshin Electric Railway Co., Ltd., Osaka Municipal Transportation Bureau and Kita-Osaka Kyuko Railway Co.,Ltd. were considering to update the auto ticketing machine system, they were approached to join in this system using same service name, "KANSAI THRU PASS" and it started the operation on March 20th, 1996.

As Hanshin Electric Railway Co., Ltd., Osaka Municipal Transportation Bureau and Kita-Osaka Kyuko Railway Co., Ltd. were considering the possibility of updating the auto ticketing machine system, they were approached to join in this system using same service name, "KANSAI THRU PASS," and it started operation on March 20, 1996.

As Hanshin Electric Railway Co., Ltd., Osaka Municipal Transportation Bureau and Kita-Osaka Kyuko Railway Co., Ltd. were considering the possibility of updating the auto-ticketing machine system, but they were approached to join in this system using the same service name, 'Surutto KANSAI (KANSAI THRU PASS),' and it started operation on March 20, 1996.
sen.cmt: 括弧修正 Surutto KANSAIを追加しました。

sen.j: 当初、スルッとKANSAIに関わる業務は加盟各社局が分担して行っていたが、加盟社局の増加とともに業務の効率化を図るため、専任事務局として株式会社スルッとカンサイが2000年7月18日に設立された。
sen.e: Originally the day to day operation of Surutto KANSAI (KANSAI THRU PASS) was distributed to each association member, as the number of the member increased, Surutto KANSAI Co Ltd was established on July 18th, 2000 to do full-time management of the company for smooth running of the operation.

Originally the day-to-day operation of Surutto KANSAI (KANSAI THRU PASS) was distributed to each association member, but as the number of members increased, Surutto KANSAI Co. Ltd. was established on July 18, 2000 to do full-time management of the company for the smooth running of the operation.

Originally, the day-to-day operation of Surutto KANSAI (KANSAI THRU PASS) was distributed to each association member, but as the number of members increased, Surutto KANSAI Co., Ltd. was established on July 18, 2000 to do full-time management of the company for the sake of smooth operations.
sen.cmt: Co., としました（カンマ追加）。

sen.j: スルッとKANSAIではプリペイドカードの提携のみにとどまらず、各種チケットや、グッズ制作販売会社とともに加盟各社のグッズなどの企画を行い、各社主要駅などでバンダイや明治製菓などと共同で企画した玩具やチューインガムなどを販売している。
sen.e: Surutto KANSAI sells not only prepaid tickets but also various tickets or products made from association member's company, also work on marketing with other sales company and sell toys or gums jointly made by other member company, such as Bandai Co., Ltd or Meiji Seika Kaisya Ltd, at major stations.

Surutto KANSAI sells not only prepaid tickets but also various tickets or products from the companies of association members; it also works on marketing with other sales companies and sell toys or gum jointly made by other member companies, such as Bandai Co., Ltd. or Meiji Seika Kaisya Ltd., at major stations.

Surutto KANSAI sells not only prepaid tickets but also various tickets, and plans and produces products of the companies of association members in collaboration with other sales companies; it sells toys or gum jointly made by companies, such as Bandai Co., Ltd. or Meiji Seika Kaisya Ltd., at major stations.

sen.j: また、切符の台紙などの資材の一括調達も行っている（ただし、入札によることが要求される公営交通機関については一括調達は行われていない）。
sen.e: Surutto KANSAI also purvey a part of materials of mounting for tickets. (The government own public transport is an exception as the materials become available with tender.)
Surutto KANSAI also purveys a part of the materials for mounting tickets (the government-owned public transport is an exception, since the materials become available through tender).

sen.j: 共同企画の玩具やコンパクトディスクやバンダイから発売されているBトレインショーティーの限定版は、基本的に一度販売されれば、再販しない方式を貫いているため、多くの関西在住の鉄道ファンなどからも再販と増販と販売制限撤廃と予約販売を求める声が多い（Bトレインショーティーの場合、南海電気鉄道が2005年11月・2007年9月、阪急電鉄・京阪電気鉄道・山陽電気鉄道が2007年6月～8月に2008年1月には大阪市交通局が、同年3月には近畿日本鉄道が其々一般販売用にアレンジして発売した）。
sen.e: As the jointly planned products like toys, compact discs or limited edition of B train shorty from Bandai Co., Ltd are all one off sale products, once they are sold out there is no reselling, so many railway funs living in Kansai ask for reselling products with unlimited stock and pre-order sale. (There was a sale of B Train Shorty which was modified to sell to the public from Nankai Electric Railway in November 2005 and September 2007, from Hankyu Railway, Keihan Electric Railway and Sanyo Electric Railway Co., Ltd in June - August 2007, from Osaka Municipal Transportation Bureau in January 2008, from Kintetsu Corporation/Kintetsu Railways in March 2008.)

As the jointly planned products like toys, compact discs or limited-edition models of the B Train Shorty from Bandai Co., Ltd. are all one-off sale products, once they are sold out there is no reselling, so many railway fans living in Kansai ask for the reselling of products with unlimited stock and pre-order sale. sen.j: 「大都市圏内の私鉄各線で共通で利用できる」という点がスルッとKANSAIと共通している関東圏のパスネットは、そのICカード版であるPASMOが登場してから1年足らずの2008年1月に発売を停止したが、スルッとKANSAIはそのICカード版と位置づけられたPiTaPaがサービスを開始して2008年現在で4年が経過しているにも関わらず、発売停止になる予定は全く無い。
sen.e: The Passnet being used in Kanto area, similar to Surutto KANSAI which can be used in various private railways in major cities, the PASMO, ID card of Passnet came out on the market however the sale of the card was suspended within a year, in January 2008, on the other hand PiTaPa, IC card of Surutto KANSAI has been on the market for sale in 2008, four years since the sale started, there is no sign of suspending the sale of this card.

The Passnet being used in the Kanto area is similar to the Surutto KANSAI, which can be used in various private railways in major cities; however, the PASMO, ID card of Passnet came out on the market but the sale of the card was suspended within a year, in January 2008, while on the other hand the PiTaPa IC card of Surutto KANSAI has been on the market for sale in 2008, four years since its launch, and there is no sign that the sale of this card will be suspended.

The Passnet being used in the Kanto area is similar to the Surutto KANSAI, which can be used in various private railways in major cities; however, when the PASMO IC card of Passnet came out on the market, the sale of the Passnet was suspended within a year, in January 2008; on the other hand, the PiTaPa, an IC card version of Surutto KANSAI, has been on the market for four years as of 2008, but there is no sign that the sale of the Surutto KANSAI card will be suspended.

sen.j: これは、PiTaPaがポストペイ（後払い）というシステムを取っているため、カードの発行に際しクレジットカードのように審査が必要（但し公表されてはいないものの、クレジットカードとは別の審査基準となっている）である一方、PASMOの場合は無条件・無記名で購入できるカードのため、カードを持てない人やクレジットカードを嫌う層に一定の需要があるためである。
sen.e: The fare used on PiTaPa can be paid afterwards and the personal information will be checked before issuing the card, same process as issuing credit cards, (there is different level of reviewing system compared to the one with the credit card although it is not announced) there is more demand for PASMO as the card can be purchased with no identification and no condition, it is easier for those who do not prefer same system like credit cards.

The fare used on PiTaPa can be paid afterwards and the personal information will be checked before the card is issued, this being the same process as issuing credit cards (there is a different level of review compared to the one with the credit card, although it is not announced); and there is more demand for PASMO since the card can be purchased with no identification and no condition, making it easier for those who don't prefer to use the same system as with credit cards.

sen.j: また利用者の声を受けて、近鉄などでは駅構内にスルッとKANSAIだけを発売する専用の自動券売機を設置したり大阪線（大和八木以西）橿原線・京都線等の特急車内で車掌がＪスルーカードとともに販売を行ったり、阪急に至っては主要駅の構内に専用のブースを設け、駅係員が自ら販売するなど、PASMOが登場してから段階的に販売規模を縮小したパスネットとは対照的に積極的に販売活動を行っている。
sen.e: In Kintetsu Corporation/Kintetsu Railways the bending machine of Surutto KANSAI was installed as requested by the consumers, conductor sold the ticket inside express train of Osaka Line (west of Yamato-yagi Station) and Kashiwara Line and Kyoto Line and so on, or in Hankyu station staff organized the small stall to sell the card inside the station, it is contrastive to compare to the sale of Passnet which decreased the level of sales gradually since PASMO was introduced.

sen.j: （相互利用によりICOCAも使用可能になったが、告知不足によりICOCAで私鉄に乗れることを知っている人が少なかったり、ICOCAへチャージできる自動券売機やICOCAで乗り越し精算ができる自動精算機が少なかったりと、JR線内より使い勝手が悪いとの声もある）ちなみに、金券ショップでは、実発売額より安価（1000円のカードが990円など）で売られていることがあるので、金券ショップで購入すればPiTaPaやICOCAよりわずかな差ではあるが安く乗車できる。

sen.j: 関東地方のパスネットや中部地方のトランパス (交通プリペイドカード)などはカード残額が初乗り運賃に満たない場合、そのカードで入場できないが、スルッとKANSAIの各カードは残額が10円でもあれば改札を通ることができ、降車の際に乗り越し精算すればよいということになっている。
sen.e: The prepaid card such as Passnet in Kanto region or Tran-Pass in Chubu region can not be used to go through the ticket gate if the credit balance is lesser than base rate, Surutto KANSAI card can be used in the same situation even the balance of the card is 10 yen, the balance can be paid after the passenger going through the ticket gate.

The prepaid card such as Passnet in the Kanto region or the Tran-Pass in the Chubu region cannot be used to go through the ticket gate if the credit balance is less than the base rate; however, the Surutto KANSAI card can be used in the same situation even the balance of the card is 10 yen, in which the balance can be paid after the passenger goes through the ticket gate.

The prepaid card such as Passnet in the Kanto region or the Tran-Pass in the Chubu region cannot be used to go through the ticket gate if the credit balance is less than the base rate; however, the Surutto KANSAI card can be used in the same situation even the balance of the card is 10 yen, in which the balance can be paid after the passenger goes through the ticket gate.

sen.j: これについては、パスネットやトランパスでは、鉄道営業法第29条ノ1にある「有効ノ乗車券ナクシテ乗車シタルトキ（＝有効な乗車券を持たずに乗車したとき）」（ここでは初乗り運賃に満たない時）に「鉄道係員ノ許諾ヲ受ケスシテ左ノ所為ヲ為シタル者ハ50円以下ノ罰金又ハ科料ニ処ス（＝鉄道係員の許諾を受けないで左記の行為を行った者は50円以下～実際は1万円以上2万円以下～の罰金または科料に処する）」という条文に則っているためだが、スルッとKANSAIを含む関西の鉄道事業者が発行するカード（JR西日本のJスルーを含む）では、これを国土交通省に届け出て「特例扱い」（鉄道係員の許諾を受けている）としているため、カード残額が初乗り運賃に満たなくても入場可能となっている。
sen.e: With regard to above, using Passnet or Tran-Pass, according to Railway Operation Act Clause 29, 1, there is a fine of under fifty yen, actually more than ten thousand yen, less than twenty thousand yen to the passengers who get on the train without having a sufficient ticket without letting train staff know, however Surutto KANSAI is an exception and is allowed to do so, as their cards including issued cards by other member's company (includes J-through of JR West Japan), as this is permitted as an exception by Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism. (It is considered that the passengers informed the railway staff.)

Regarding the above, using Passnet or Tran-Pass, according to Railway Operation Act Clause 29, 1, there is a fine of under fifty yen, actually more than ten thousand yen, less than twenty thousand yen to the passenger who gets onto the train without having a sufficient ticket, and without letting train staff know; however, Surutto KANSAI is an exception and allows this, as their cards (including those issued by other member companies, including J-through of JR West Japan) are permitted as an exception by Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism (it is considered that the passengers informed the railway staff).

Regarding the above, using Passnet or Tran-Pass, according to Railway Operation Act Clause 29, 1, there is a fine of under 50 yen, in fact more than 10,000 yen, less than 20,000 yen to the passenger who gets onto the train without having a sufficient ticket whose value is more than the base rate, and without letting train staff know; however, Surutto KANSAI is an exception and allows this, since their cards (including those issued by other member companies, including J-Thru of JR West) are permitted as an exception by Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism (it is considered that the passengers have informed the railway staff).
sen.cmt: whose value is more than the base rate, 追加しました。J-Thruとしました。"actually"→"in fact"に変更しました。

sen.e: This is very convenient for the passengers as they can ride on the train even they do not have enough credit on the cards, especially there is no time to buy tickets when the train is already at the platform. (Rushing onto the train is dangerous so it it not recommended.)

tit.j: 近鉄の加入までの経緯
tit.e: The history of Kintetsu Corporation/Kintetsu Railways (called as Kintetsu afterwards) joined into Surutto KANSAI.

sen.j: 近鉄は以下の理由で参加が遅かった。
sen.e: Kintetsu did not join the association until late due to following background.

sen.j: ストアードフェアシステムを導入するにはコストがかかりすぎ、増収効果では追いつかないこと。
sen.e: To introduce stored fare system is too costly and there is not enough return by collect money afterwards.
It would have been too costly to introduce the stored fare system, and there wasn't enough return by collecting money afterwards.

sen.j: 自動改札機の投資が膨大

sen.j: 自動券売機などの投資も膨大
sen.e: Also investing an automatic ticket machine/automatic ticket vending machine is too costly.

sen.j: 既に導入していたプリペイドカード「パールカード」とサイズ以外の規格が全く異なり、自動券売機なども全面改修が必要となった。
sen.e: Kintetsu had to consider to modify their automatic ticket machine as the standard of Surutto KANSAI card was different from their prepaid card, apart from the size, 'Pearl Card' which was previously introduced from Kintetsu Railways.

sen.j: 近鉄自身、あまり必要性がなかった
sen.e: There was no big necessity for Kintetsu to introduce the system.
There was no big necessity for Kintetsu to introduce the system.
There was no big necessity for Kintetsu to introduce the system.

sen.j: 既にJR西日本との競合にさらされていた阪急・南海などの他の関西私鉄に比べて、JR西日本との競合路線はそれほど多くなかった。
sen.e: Kintetsu Railways did not have many competitive route against JR West Japan compare to other private railway company like Hankyu and Nankai Railway who are already competing against JR.
Kintetsu Railways did not have many competitive routes against JR West Japan compared to other private railway companies like Hankyu and Nankai Railway, which were already competing against JR.

sen.j: 後にJスルーを共同で発行しているように、上記共同使用駅の問題もあった。
sen.e: As J-through was introduced jointly, there were some issues about sharing same station mentioned above.
Because J-through was introduced jointly, there were some issues about sharing the same stations, as mentioned above.
Because J-Thru was introduced jointly, there were some issues about sharing the same stations, as mentioned above.

sen.j: ストアードフェアシステムそのものによる旅客増しか増収要因にはならないが、投資額に見合うほどは期待できない
sen.e: Kintetsu did not expect much return from the increase of passengers using stored fare system after investing money.
Kintetsu didn't expect much return from the increase of passengers using the stored fare system after investing money.
Kintetsu didn't expect much return from the increase of passengers using the stored fare system after investing money.

sen.j: 以上の理由により、当時の近鉄ではストアードフェア導入には消極的であった。
sen.e: Due to above background, Kintetsu was not so keen to introduce stored fare system.
Given the above background, Kintetsu wasn't very eager to introduce the stored fare system.
Given the above background, Kintetsu wasn't very eager to introduce the stored fare system.

sen.j: 一方、スルッとKANSAI側でも、近鉄の路線エリアがあまりにも広大すぎることはネックとなった。
sen.e: On the other hand it was not convenient for Surutto KANSAI to have Kintetsu's enormous route.
On the other hand, it wasn't convenient for Surutto KANSAI to have Kintetsu's enormous route.
On the other hand, it wasn't convenient for Surutto KANSAI to have Kintetsu's enormous route.

sen.j: すなわち、300駅を超える近鉄の駅データを追加し、近鉄の複雑な運賃制度がシステムの大きな負担となることが懸念された。
sen.e: In another words, it was a big burden for Surutto KANSAI to add not only more than three hundred station data into the system but also to deal with Kintetsu's complicated fare system.
In another words, it was a great burden for Surutto KANSAI to add not only the data of more than 300 stations into the system but also to deal with Kintetsu's complicated fare system.
In another words, it was a great burden for Surutto KANSAI to add not only the data of more than 300 stations into the system but also to deal with Kintetsu's complicated fare system.

sen.j: また全駅自動改札設置を各社の参加条件としていたこともある。
sen.e: It is one of the reason not to join in that there was a requirement of setting up automatic ticket machine to all the stations.
One reason for not joining in is that there was a requirement of setting up automatic ticket machines at all stations.
One reason for not joining in is that there was a requirement of setting up automatic ticket machines at all stations.

sen.j: さらに近鉄には、乗車券の経路が指定されて大回り乗車ができないことや、長距離乗車券の2日間有効制度、途中下車制度など、ストアードフェアシステム導入に支障のある制度があったことも障害となった。
sen.e: In addition to above, as Kintetsu card had some restrictions, not allowed to go on long round trip with base fare ticket, two day validity of long distance ticket and not to allowed to get off on the way and so on, which can be obstacle for introducing stored fare system.

In addition to the above, since the Kintetsu card had some restrictions, such as not being allowed to go on a long round trip with a base-fare ticket, two-day validity of long-distance tickets and prohibition from getting off on the way and so on, all of which were obstacles to the introduction of a stored fare system.

In addition to the above, since the Kintetsu card had some restrictions, such as not being allowed to go on a long round trip with a base-fare ticket, two-day validity of long-distance tickets and prohibition from getting off on the way and so on, all of which were obstacles to the introduction of a stored fare system.

sen.j: しかし、その後以下のように状況に変化があり、近鉄もストアードフェアシステム導入を行った。
sen.e: However the situation changed as follows, Kintetsu decided to go ahead with introducing stored fare system.
However, the situation changed as follows: Kintetsu decided to go ahead with the introduction of the stored fare system.
However, the situation changed as follows: Kintetsu decided to go ahead with the introduction of the stored fare system.

sen.j: 定期乗車券の不正乗車防止システムの開発により、自動改札機投資に対する増収額が大幅に増加した。
sen.e: After new system was developed to prevent illegal usage of commuting ticket, more money was collected by using automatic ticket gate.
After the new system was developed to prevent the illegal use of commuter tickets, more money was collected by using the automatic ticket gate.
After the new system was developed to prevent the illegal use of commuter passes, more money was collected by using the automatic ticket gate.

sen.j: 2枚対応自動改札機が開発され、鶴橋駅JR連絡改札の問題が解消された。
sen.e: The problem was solved at connecting gate of Tsuruhashi Station after introducing automatic ticket gate which takes two tickets at a same time.
The problem was solved at the connecting gate of Tsuruhashi Station after introducing the automatic ticket gate, which takes two tickets at the same time.
The problem was solved at the connecting gate to the JR lines at Tsuruhashi Station after introducing the automatic ticket gate, which takes two tickets at the same time.

sen.j: 乗降客の減少により自動改札機の必要台数が減り、投資額が減少した。
sen.e: The amount of investing money into automatic ticket gate decreased due to not much demand on using them after decline of passengers.
The amount of the investment needed for an automatic ticket gate decreased due to the lack of demand for their use after the decline in passengers.
The amount of the investment needed for an automatic ticket gate decreased due to the lack of demand for their use after the decline in passengers.

sen.j: この後、近鉄は近鉄田原本線利用時を除く乗車券の経路指定や長距離乗車券の2日間有効制度、途中下車制度を廃止し、スルッとKANSAI側も自動改札機全駅設置を条件とせず、近鉄の加盟が実現した。
sen.e: After this Kintesru finally joined in to the association as they discontinued the restriction of setting a certain route for each ticket, two day validity of long distance ticket and stopover system, and Surutto KANSAI abolished the condition of having automatic ticket machine to all the stations.

Subsequently, Kintesru finally joined the association as it discontinued the restriction of setting a certain route for each ticket, two-day validity for long-distance tickets and the stopover system; concurrently, Surutto KANSAI abolished the condition of having automatic ticket machines at all the stations.

Subsequently, Kintetsu finally joined the association as it discontinued the restriction of setting a certain route (except for Kintetsu Tawara Main Line) for each ticket, two-day validity for long-distance tickets and the stopover system; concurrently, Surutto KANSAI abolished the condition of having automatic ticket machines at all stations.
